Race.SpecificTitle: PW Law Enforcement Dist. -- 1/2% S&U Tax Renewal - Sheriff - 12 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Law Enforcement District Proposition
(Sales Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy and continue to collect a sales and use tax of one-half of one percent (1/2%), for an additional period of twelve (12) years, effective April 1, 2020 (the "Tax"), under the Uniform Local Sales Tax Law (estimated annual revenues: $1,000,000), with the net proceeds to be dedicated and used for the purposes of paying lawful expenses of operating the District and the LaSalle Parish Sheriff's Office?
